statements: DELETE FROM transaction_logs WHERE user_id = '789e0123-e45f-67d8-b901-234567890abc' AND transaction_time < NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day';
DELETE FROM audit_trails WHERE action = 'Delete' AND audit_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM disputes WHERE reason = 'Fraudulent activity';
DELETE FROM transaction_logs WHERE log_id = 1001 AND user_id = 500
DELETE FROM audit_trails WHERE user_id = 200 AND details LIKE '%error%'
DELETE FROM transaction_logs WHERE transaction_id = 123 AND action = 'update';
DELETE FROM audit_trails WHERE user_id = 456 AND event_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
